faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my first document really free?
faq.a1: Yes, your first document signing through 123LegalDoc powered by SignWell is completely free. Subsequent documents are charged on a per-signature basis.
faq.a2: No, recipients do not need a 123LegalDoc or SignWell account to sign documents. They will receive an email with a secure link to view and sign.
faq.q3: Can I draw my signature on mobile?
faq.a3: Absolutely. Our platform is fully responsive, allowing you and your recipients to draw, type, or upload signatures on any device, including mobile phones and tablets.
faq.q4: What file types do you support?
faq.a4: You can upload PDF, DOCX, and ODT files. We automatically convert them to a secure PDF format for signing.
faq.q5: How do I download the audit trail?
faq.a5: A comprehensive, tamper-proof audit trail is generated for every signed document. You can download it from your document dashboard once all parties have signed.
faq.a6: SignWell offers HIPAA compliant plans for businesses dealing with Protected Health Information (PHI). Please contact us for more details on enabling HIPAA compliance for your account.
